name: Lapis Gunner
storyline: Lapis Gunner sets out to rescue Ruby Striker from the claws of evil, but gets caught herself instead. Sacrificed to a joyfully wriggling horde of tentacles, Lapis Gunner's reason begins to crumble. And then, before the girl at her limit, Ruby Striker appears, but...
